title: Interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of gold in a dream Bad Interpretation of gold in a dream Most of its interpretations are good, and many dreamers advise us to take shelter from the evil of seeing gold in a dream in general, in any case, and not to discuss it. Some interpreters believe that it is a good thing, even a little, and this is what we will delve into together. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing gold in a dream between good and evil. The Mokhtilaun website explains to you the approved opinions of the great interpreters of visions and dreams in interpreting gold in a dream: Ibn Sirin confirms in interpreting gold in The dream is that it is bad and unpleasant in a dream, and there is no good in seeing it. In his interpretation of seeing gold in a dream, Ibn Sirin relied on its yellow color, with its hateful connotations, because the yellow color often brings hatred, illness, jealousy, and hatred. As well as the pronunciation of the name of gold itself, because It means the disappearance of something and its deprivation. This indicates that the general meaning of seeing gold in a dream indicates worries, sorrows, lack of money, and illness, and we exclude from this hateful interpretation that the dreamer is a woman. It should also be noted that gold, when it comes in the form of jewelry, is weaker than gold. Raw or raw gold bullion. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing gold in an unmarried woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of gold in a dream for an unmarried woman, if she sees it in a dream, is a good and praiseworthy vision, because it indicates good times and a happy life that will soon come to her. If an unmarried woman sees that she has bought a gold ring, this vision indicates that someone is proposing to her, and the engagement ends at best. If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying different pieces of gold and she is satisfied with them, this indicates the good news that will arrive soon. As you can see The interpretation of gold in a dream is bad. If she cries and is sad when she sees gold in front of her, this indicates a marriage proposal that brings her worries and sorrows into her heart. Interpretation of a married woman seeing gold in her dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of gold in a dream for a married woman shows that if she sees in her dream that she is buying gold, This vision indicates that she will gain a lot of money and livelihood in the coming period. But if a married woman sees someone who gave her a gift or bought her gold, and he is her husband, then this vision indicates that she will become pregnant soon. As he promised her goodness, Ibn Sirin also says that the evil of interpreting gold In a dream for a married woman, if she sees it and is upset by it, this indicates a period full of worries, sorrow, and misfortunes. What did Ibn Sirin say about seeing gold in a dream for a man? Ibn Sirin’s opinion on the interpretation of gold in a dream for a man if he is married, as this vision portends the birth of a child if his wife Pregnant or soon pregnant with a boy. If a man sees gold in general in his dream and he is a merchant, then this vision can be interpreted as a loss in his trade or business. If a man sees in his dream that he has obtained a bullion of gold in his dream, this is a sign of intense anger And the sadness that afflicts him. But if a man sees a golden ring in his dream, this is evidence of distress, a feeling of distress, lack of freedom and power.

title: Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping on a bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone sleeping in my bed Seeing someone sleeping in my bed is one of the disturbing visions that arouse the dreamer’s surprise and curiosity in its interpretation, especially if the dreamer is a woman and sees someone other than her husband sleeping next to her in bed, whether she knows him or her. A stranger, or rather a dead person, as well as unmarried, pregnant and divorced women, and for this reason we are interested in listing all the interpretations of this vision by scholars and jurists, led by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping in my bed. Scientists provide various evidence to interpret the vision of a person sleeping in my bed, the most important of which are the following: Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping in my bed Sleeping on my bed and a relative is a sign of great benefit from him and his support for the dreamer in crises. Ibn Shaheen says that if the dreamer sees his friend sleeping next to her in her bed, this is evidence that she is a loyal person who always stands by her in her sorrows. Seeing a stranger sleeping in his bed symbolizes The beginning of a new phase in one’s life, which may be on a professional or emotional level. Seeing a dreamer sleeping in his bed smiling indicates the arrival of happy news, but if he is sullen and frowning, this dreamer may portend the passage of bad events in the coming period. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision Sleeping on my bed. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of a dream about a person sleeping on my bed that: Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams of someone sleeping on his bed will compensate him for his loss of money. If the fortuneteller is a person of power and influence and sees in a dream a person sleeping next to him, he may be removed from his position. Seeing someone who is quarreling with him sleeping in my bed in a dream is a sign of the collapse of the quarrel and the end of hostility to reconciliation. Interpretation of seeing someone sleeping in my bed for single people: Seeing an ugly person sleeping in her bed in a dream indicates that she is deviating from the right path in her life and committing wrong actions that she may regret. He says Ibn Sirin said that if a girl sees in a dream a smiling man sleeping on her bed, this is evidence of an upcoming marriage and a happy life in the future. Seeing the fortuneteller, a member of her family, sleeping in her place on the bed, and it was untidy, may foretell that they will fall into disputes. Interpretation of the vision An interpretation of seeing someone I know sleeping in my bed for single people indicates a promotion at work and reaching a prominent professional position. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a girl who is one of her mahrams sleeping in her bed is evidence of a feeling of trust in that person and great security in his company. Interpretation Seeing someone sleeping on the bed of a married woman: Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing a married woman he knows sleeping in her bed indicates that she is revealing the secrets of her home to others and interfering in her life a lot. As for the viewer who watches one of her relatives sleeping in her bed while he is suspended in the air and falling, this may indicate his illness or death. Ibn Sirin narrated that the interpretation of a dream about someone sleeping in a bed for a married woman is an indication of the approaching pregnancy and childbirth. If the wife sees her husband sleeping in her bed and the bed is dirty, this may symbolize constant disputes and harassment between them and that they are living in laziness and sadness. title: Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping on a bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone sleeping in my bed Seeing someone sleeping in my bed is one of the disturbing visions that arouse the dreamer’s surprise and curiosity in its interpretation, especially if the dreamer is a woman and sees someone other than her husband sleeping next to her in bed, whether she knows him or her. A stranger, or rather a dead person, as well as unmarried, pregnant and divorced women, and for this reason we are interested in listing all the interpretations of this vision by scholars and jurists, led by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping in my bed. Scientists provide various evidence to interpret the vision of a person sleeping in my bed, the most important of which are the following: Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping in my bed Sleeping on my bed and a relative is a sign of great benefit from him and his support for the dreamer in crises. Ibn Shaheen says that if the dreamer sees his friend sleeping next to her in her bed, this is evidence that she is a loyal person who always stands by her side in her sorrows. Seeing a stranger sleeping in his bed symbolizes The beginning of a new phase in one’s life, which may be on a professional or emotional level. Seeing a dreamer sleeping in his bed smiling indicates the arrival of happy news, but if he is sullen and frowning, this dreamer may portend the passage of bad events in the coming period. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision Sleeping on my bed. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of a dream about a person sleeping on my bed that: Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams of someone sleeping on his bed will compensate him for his loss of money. If the fortuneteller is a person of power and influence and sees in a dream a person sleeping next to him, he may be removed from his position. Seeing someone who is quarreling with him sleeping in my bed in a dream is a sign of the collapse of the quarrel and the end of hostility to reconciliation. Interpretation of seeing someone sleeping in my bed for single people: Seeing an ugly person sleeping in her bed in a dream indicates that she is deviating from the right path in her life and committing wrong actions that she may regret. He says Ibn Sirin said that if a girl sees in a dream a smiling man sleeping on her bed, this is evidence of an upcoming marriage and a happy life in the future. Seeing the fortuneteller, a member of her family, sleeping in her place on the bed, and it was untidy, may foretell that they will fall into disputes. Interpretation of the vision An interpretation of seeing someone I know sleeping in my bed for single people indicates a promotion at work and reaching a prominent professional position. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a girl who is one of her mahrams sleeping in her bed is evidence of a feeling of trust in that person and great security in his company. Interpretation Seeing someone sleeping on the bed of a married woman: Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing a married woman he knows sleeping in her bed indicates that she is revealing the secrets of her home to others and interfering in her life a lot. As for the viewer who watches one of her relatives sleeping in her bed while he is hanging in the air and falling, this may indicate his illness or death. Ibn Sirin narrated that the interpretation of a dream about someone sleeping on a bed for a married woman is an indication of the approaching pregnancy and childbirth. If the wife sees her husband sleeping in her bed and the bed is dirty, this may symbolize constant disputes and harassment between them and that they are living in laziness and sadness.
